text: daivadūtane dhikkaricc yud'dhattilninn pinmāṟi vīṭṭilirunnatil ‎santēāṣikkunnavarāṇavar. taṅṅaḷuṭe dhanaṅkeāṇṭuṁ dēhaṅkeāṇṭuṁ ‎daivamārgttil samaraṁ ceyyunnat avarkk aniṣṭakaramāyi. ‎avariṅṅane paṟayukayuṁ ceytu: "ī keāṭun̄cūṭil niṅṅaḷ ‎yud'dhattiniṟaṅṅippuṟappeṭēṇṭa.” paṟayuka: narakattī kūṭutal ‎cūṭēṟiyatāṇ. avar bēādhavānmārāyirunneṅkil etra nannāyēne. ‎
